snippet.title: Rusty Flesh Demo Trailer | Gravity-switching Sci-fi Horror for the Game Boy Color, Coming in 2025
snippet.description:
Rusty Flesh is a short sci-fi horror puzzle platformer for the Game Boy Color (also available for PC!) where you switch gravity instead of jumping (is that a VVVVVV-like?). Explore the different areas of a derelict spaceship putting together all the pieces of its lovecraftian mistery, and enjoy its retro-futuristic aesthetics.

Rusty Flesh will be released in 2025, but you can play the demo on itch.io and Steam now, and wishlist it if you like it!

- Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2962940/Rusty_Flesh/
- Itch.io: https://wasteland-gms.itch.io/rusty-flesh

Music: Estación Fantasma, by Damasco (https://damascobcn.bandcamp.com/)

#videogames #indiegame #solodev #gameboy #gameboycolor #indiedev #retrogames
